I have a question about the existence of so called "Warrior Monks". 
Did th=
ey really exist? Were they just ordained lay Buddhists? I have 
seen severa=
l pictures of samurai wearing rakusu (a bib like garment 
worn around the n=
eck and across the chest with a small ring on one 
side) denoting being an =
ordained lay Buddhist. How did they get past 
the Buddhist precept of not k=
illing? Are there any stories or books on 
this subject? 

Michael Minock

=
